analysis.key_quote: If such employees are fearful of being fired on an at-will basis, because their objective analysis does not line up with the particular ideology or preconceived notions of their politicals, then they are going to give bad analysis.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization, the loss of objective analysis, and the erosion of national security, which aligns with the themes of merit-based systems and due process rights.
